name: Cavalier Geneve - White Series - Petit N2
maker: Fabrica Centroamericana de Tabaco S. A.
additionalNotes: Cavalier Genève White Series is the flagship line from Cavalier Genève. The ‘All White Series’ has a milder profile that accentuates the blends flavor profile. Notes of cream, wood, and stone fruit are noticeable when smoking this flawless cigar. The mellow flavors of this cigar top out at a mild-medium bodied experience. The White Series line is the flagship line from Cavalier Genève. All White Series cigars are very aromatic and stay mild to medium in strength.
